function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential influence of political orientation on compliance with pandemic measures","Impact":"Reduced compliance with pandemic measures, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide education and unbiased information about pandemic measures, promote understanding of the importance of compliance regardless of political orientation","Technologies":"Information dissemination tools, social media monitoring and regulation","People":"General population, especially those with strong political orientations","Owner":"Health authorities, government, media organizations"},{"Description":"Echo chambers reinforcing particular political orientations and influencing views on pandemic measures","Impact":"Creation of misinformation and polarization leading to reduced compliance with pandemic measures","Mitigation":"Promote diverse sources of information, fact-checking, and critical thinking skills, encourage exposure to different viewpoints","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, social media algorithms for diverse content exposure","People":"General population, especially those consuming information from echo chambers","Owner":"Media platforms, educational institutions, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Influence of fear of authorities on compliance with pandemic measures","Impact":"Reluctance to comply with measures leading to increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Promote trust in authorities through transparency, accountability, and clear communication","Technologies":"Transparency tools for government actions, public communication platforms","People":"General population, especially those with fear of authorities","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, communication experts"}]}
